scripts.test-go: docker-compose -f docker-util.yml run utils bash -c "cd blockchain/src/build-chaincode && GOPATH=$(pwd)/../.. go test"
scripts.test-server: docker-compose build server && docker-compose run server bash -c "npm test"
scripts.test-e2e: docker-compose exec server bash -c "npm run e2e"
scripts.test: npm -s run test-server && npm -s run test-go
scripts.cf: docker build --tag cf . && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/server/resources:/usr/src/app/server/resources cf
